name: Race Face T2 Tailgate Pad
description: A deluxe ride for your herd of 2-wheeled steeds. This burly tailgate pad is built for hauling your crew's rides up gravel spitting backroads in search of the best trails. Tough materials and extra padding is equally kind to your truck.Construction combines tough PVC tarpaulin and hyperlon fabric with thick foam.Foam bumpers hold the downtube securely inside the box.6 adjustable straps let you fit the pad to your tailgate's shape.Micro-brushed underside lining reduces wear marks on your truck's paint.Lock loop lets you secure the pad to your truck.Capacity for 5 bikes in S/M and 6 bikes in L/XL.Lengths by size: S/M (57 in) and L/XL (61 in).Adjustable camera window.
